org.jclouds.openstack.keystone.v2_0

Interface KeystoneAsyncApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    Deprecated. 
    please use org.jclouds.ContextBuilder#buildApi(KeystoneApi.class) as KeystoneAsyncApi interface will be removed in jclouds 1.7.

    @Deprecated
public interface KeystoneAsyncApi
extends Closeable
    Provides access to OpenStack keystone resources via their REST API.

    Author:
    Adam Lowe
    See Also:
    , KeystoneApi
